title: 489 33 "Here Comes Shanks! The War of the Best is Finally Over!"Transliteration: "Shankusu Kenzan! Chōjō Sensō Tsuini Shūketsu" (Japanese:シャンクス見参! 頂上戦争ついに終結) Yutaka Nakashima Hitoshi Tanaka March 6, 2011(2011-03-06)[37]
transformers_text: 489 33 Here Comes Shanks The War of the Best is Finally Over Transliteration Shank usu Kenz an Ch j Sens Tsu in i Sh ke tsu Japanese Yutaka Na kashima Hitoshi Tanaka March 6 2011 2011 03 06 37 Shanks tricks Buggy into returning Luffy's straw hat to him noting that while he would like to see Luffy again it is too soon for their reunion Law's submarine barely escapes from Aoki ji and Ki zar u's attacks and Ki zar u declares that they will have to give up if that did not kill Luffy Hancock requests a Marine ship to go after Luffy out of concern for him Shanks convinces the Marines the White beard Pirates and the Blackbeard Pirates to stand down by saying that fighting will only lead to more casualties and declaring that he will fight those who still wish to do so All those involved agree and the Summit War of Marine ford finally ends
tf_idf_text: come shank war best finally transliteration shank usu kenz sen tsu tsu japanese yutaka kashima hitoshi tanaka march shank trick buggy return luffys straw hat note would like see luffy soon reunion law submarine barely escapes aoki zar attack zar declares give not kill luffy hancock request marine ship luffy concern shank convinces marine white beard pirate blackbeard pirate stand say fight lead casualty declare fight still wish involve agree summit war marine ford finally end
